thread.title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Management Group Says William Barr To Resign From Board

title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Management Group Says William Barr To Resign From Board

organizations.name: brief-och-ziff capital management group says william barr to resign from boar
brief-och-ziff capital management group says william barr to resign from board

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Och-Ziff Capital Management Group Llc :
* OCH-ZIFF CAPITAL MANAGEMENT GROUP LLC - ON JAN 23, 2018, WILLIAM P. BARR NOTIFIED CO THAT HE WILL RESIGN FROM BOARD, EFFECTIVE AS OF JANUARY 31, 2018
* OCH-ZIFF CAPITAL MANAGEMENT-BARRâ€™S RESIGNATION RELATES TO DISAGREEMENT OVER CEO SUCCESSION, AS WELL AS BUSINESS, GOVERNANCE PLANS FOR CO-SEC FILING Source text - bit.ly/2E08SSa Further company coverage:
